schema.description:
Readiness probe response (F074 enhanced).

Indicates whether the service is ready to accept traffic by checking
all critical and non-critical dependencies.

additionalProperties.description: Dependency check result included in readiness responses.
additionalProperties.title: DependencyCheck

schema.title: ReadinessResponse
